Wednesday.title: Dumbbell Bench Press
Wednesday.description: Flat bench chest press with dumbbells — 3×8.

Wednesday.title: Dumbbell Floor Fly
Wednesday.description: Lie on the floor, slow wide arcs to target chest — 3×8.

Wednesday.title: Overhead Dumbbell Triceps Extension
Wednesday.description: Standing single or double DB overhead extensions — 3×8.

Wednesday.title: Bench Dips
Wednesday.description: Hands on bench, feet on floor; keep shoulders down — 3×8.

Thursday.title: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
Thursday.description: Support on bench, row the DB to hip — 3×8/side.

Thursday.title: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
Thursday.description: Hinge at hips, neutral back, slow stretch — 3×8.

Thursday.title: Dumbbell Reverse Fly
Thursday.description: Hip hinge, raise DBs to T-shape for upper back — 3×8.

Friday.title: Warmup
Friday.description: 5–7 min light cardio + shoulder circles/band pull-aparts.

Friday.title: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
Friday.description: Soft elbows, raise to shoulder height — 3×8.

Friday.title: Dumbbell Front Raise
Friday.description: Raise DBs in front to shoulder height — 3×8.

Friday.title: Rear Delt Row
Friday.description: Hip hinge, row out toward ribcage for rear delts — 3×8.

Saturday.title: Goblet Squat
Saturday.description: Hold DB at chest, sit deep — 3×8.

Saturday.title: Dumbbell Thruster
Saturday.description: Front squat into overhead press — full-body — 3×8.

Saturday.title: Crunches (Normal)
Saturday.description: Controlled floor crunches; ribcage toward pelvis — 3×8.

Saturday.title: Russian Twist
Saturday.description: Lean back, twist side to side — 3×8/side.

Sunday.title: Dumbbell Squat
Sunday.description: DBs at sides or rack position — 3×8.

Sunday.title: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge
Sunday.description: Step back, front knee tracks toes — 3×8/side.

Sunday.title: Standing Calf Raise
Sunday.description: Full stretch and squeeze; hold DBs — 3×8.
